doc.title: Acquiring a Taste for Raffaella
doc.plot: Raphaella's first period comes at the same time as her first crush, on Shaun, a cook's assistant and the brother of her friend Sharon. Raphaella's Italian aunt insists that they make "love biscuits" for Shaun, a recipe from the old country using three drops of menstrual blood. Raphaella sends the cookies to Shaun via Sharon, who announces her own crush on Raphaella. Is it the cookies? What's a girl to do? With the help of her aunt and some ideas of her own, Raphaella finds a solution and learns something about friendship and romance.
